ai-thag3.6:1.1_0: “One of those monks who live in Pāṭaliputta—
ai-thag3.6:1.2_0: such brilliant speakers, and very learned—
ai-thag3.6:2.1_0: “One of those monks who live in Pāṭaliputta—
ai-thag3.6:2.2_0: such brilliant speakers, and very learned—
ai-thag3.6:2.4_0: open the door to the wind.”
ai-thag3.6:3.4_0: that’s how one prospers in happiness.”
